title: "AI Pioneer: ChatGPT Will Soon Become Scholars’ ‘Debate Partner’"
excerpt: "The professor and Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) provost has been researching AI for the better part of three decades. This spring, when other universities banned the use of ChatGPT, he oversaw its adoption at his institution, encouraging lecturers to work the tool into their lesson plans."
